column1: 20686,Annihilation: Conquest (2007) #4,4,27725,84,"The cosmic blockbuster thunders on - with our villains on the verge of victory! Ultron gets his hands on Star-Lord! Ronan makes a chilling revelation! Adam Warlock gets the shock he never expected! Writers Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning join forces with superstar artist Tom Raney to bring you the sci-fi event that Wizard calls ""Mystery, action and adventure on a galactic scale!"",2007,11
